title: Map showing travels of African slaves

content.question: The map above illustratesÂ which of the following?

choices.label: The most frequent destinations for African emigrants of the twentieth century
Predominant areas of origin and destinations of African slaves in the fifteenth through nineteenth centuries
Proportional flows of African agricultural commodities during the nineteenth century
Winds and water currents that affected trans-Atlantic and trans-Saharan trade

content.answer: Predominant areas of origin and destinations of African slaves in the fifteenth through nineteenth centuries

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
